oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Characterisation of small ruminant production in Crete
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Stefanakis, Alexandros
Smaragda, Sotiraki
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Breeding and genetics
Sheep and goats
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Subproject 2 of the LowInputBreeds project aims to improve performance, animal health & welfare, and product quality in organic and low input breed sheep production systems. One focus is breeding under Mediterranean conditions
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Stefanakis, Alexandros and Smaragda, Sotiraki (2011) Characterisation of small ruminant production in Crete. Newsletter of the LowInputBreeds project, 2 (4), pp. 4-6.
